game.name: The Ballad of a True Thug
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The dark underbelly of 1990s Europe, criminal enterprise, and rivers of blood. Rise from a petty crook to a criminal legend, where every shot must be precise and any mistake is fatal. A brutal, top-down tactical shooter.
